thread.section_title: Otticanet Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Otticanet | www.otticanet.com
thread.title: M. Lopez
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da M. Lopez

author: M. Lopez
title: M. Lopez
text: I ordered two pairs of frames from Otticanet. I received them very quickly (in the U.S.). They did not work out for me. I requested instructions on how to return them. I received a very nice and quick reply. They offered to send me a return label and I used that for my return. Even though the frames I ordered did not work out, and I had to pay for my return, I am very happy with the service Otticanet provided to me. I won't hesitate to order from them again. Happy customer, Miriam.
